name: Until your King is Dead (Jam Edition)
name_original: Until your King is Dead (Jam Edition)
description:
Grab a friend,  Play chaotic real-time chess

Quick chess games with real strategy in less than 5 minutes.

Trick your opponents, protect your king, smash their pieces, and declare victory.

Do not stop 

Until their King is Dead Changelog
